title: Rotational inertia of sphere about axis tangent

content.prompt: The rotational inertia of a sphere of mass M and radius R about a diameter is  2 5 M R 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D96@ . The rotational inertia about an axis tangent to the sphere is

choices.label: 3 2 M R 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D94@

7 5 M R 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D9B@

1 2 M R 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D92@

2 5 M R 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D96@

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
